players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, you're the mafioso. Villagers, be cautious."
Charlie: "I'm innocent, discuss alibis. Alice, help prove my case."
Bob: "Investigating Diana, looking for clues. Charlie, any alibi?"
You: "Bob, check alibis. Charlie, prove your innocence to villagers."
Charlie: "I was with Bob last night, we played cards. Alice, check our alibis."
Bob: "Checking alibis with Charlie, no suspicious activity. Alice, any updates?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested
